title: Bacterial Cell Diagram
description: An illustration of a bacterial cell, showing its elongated shape with a cell membrane, cytoplasm, and genetic material. The cell is depicted with hair-like structures (flagella) for movement and a simplified internal structure.

title: Cell Structure
description: An illustration of a cell, showcasing various organelles such as the nucleus, mitochondria, and endoplasmic reticulum, all suspended in a cytoplasmic environment. The cell is depicted in a semi-transparent manner, allowing for a clear view of its internal components.

title: Snails
description: A close-up image of three snails, showcasing their shells and elongated bodies. The snails are positioned in a way that highlights their unique textures and colors.

title: Microscope with Specimen
description: An illustration of a laboratory microscope, featuring a black and white design with various knobs and lenses. Next to the microscope, there is a circular inset showing a green, elongated specimen, possibly a type of algae or small organism, set against a light blue background.
